messages.firstPerson: You strut confidently around {target}, showing off.
messages.secondPerson: {actor} struts around you with exaggerated confidence. Are they showing off?
messages.thirdPerson: {actor} struts around {target} like a peacock in full display.
messages.untargeted: You strut around with the confidence of a peacock wearing sunglasses.
messages.untargetedRoom: {actor} struts around like they own the place. The swagger is real.
